February 9, 2023

Analysis on Global Commodity Trade 2014-2016

  • Data Analytics Immersive Program
  • General Assembly, Bahrain
  • Team: Mohammed Jaafar & Jubran AlTaitoon
  • Tools: SQLite and Tableau

This project provides a comprehensive analysis of global commodity trade, leveraging data from the United Nations Statistics Division for the year 2014 - 2016. We will identify key trade patterns, including leading importing and exporting nations, significant re-export and re-import activities, and the most valuable traded commodities. The analysis culminates in an interactive dashboard, visualizing each country's trade performance with metrics such as total imports/exports, top traded goods, and trade balance, offering actionable insights into global trade dynamics.

Data Source: Global Commodity Trade Statistics - Kaggle
